### .uri_path_packer

What is going on here, why is it necessary?

When I originally wrote the functions they one accepted one key so you the user would need to map over a vector or arguments.

This is fine but it sent multiple requests to the API.  I read some SO that it is better for the API to make a large request because there is a level of compression done on the data by the API.  So I learned about a new way to construct the uris to make fewer but larger requests.
